channel.title: [Allstar + Silabclient] Hep on dropdownmenus on npcs
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this is server sided or client sided. What I'm wanting to do is add a "trade" option under an NPC's name. Simply to make any NPC I want a shop. Can anyone tell me where I find these files? I'm using an allstar base with Silab webclient.
I've been coding on it about 2 years and it's going really great acually, a revolutionary Allstar base that I've edited a bit away from allstar. Npc's and Objects drop down menus is the only problems were having.

item.title: [Allstar + Silabclient] Hep on dropdownmenus on npcs
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Lord Fox, post:3, topic:452276”]I have a heavily edited silabscape client. Thanks for the guidances to the Client forums.
I just hate updating my webclient. Dx[/quote]

You’re going to end up with a corrupted Cache just so you know.

Read full topic
item.source: [Allstar + Silabclient] Hep on dropdownmenus on npcs
